did.unittitle: American Federation of Teachers, Local 1460 Records

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:

Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2630

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection documents a unionizing drive for faculty at New York University in the 1970s. The collection contains issues of the Over Due Gazette - a newsletter about the union efforts, NYU Federation of United Professionals Newsletter, NYU Workers' Voice, and material relating to the United Federation of College Teachers (UFCT).
